channel.title: Docs on Okemos Chess
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Okemos Chess

item.title: Summer Swiss 1
item.description: Summer Swiss (I) Tournament Date: Sunday, July 20, 2024 Scheduled Time: 10 AM EST to 2 PM EST Location: 2055 Towner Rd, Haslett, MI 48840 Rating: USCF Quick and Regular Time control: 30 minutes, no delay and no bonus Please bring: chess clock, pen, chess set Other: Tournament is held in an outdoor pavilion. Dress appropriately and please bring refreshments to stay hydrated because the weather may be warm. Also, you must fill out the pre-registration form and respond to the verification email on the morning of the tournament by 9:30 AM EST on July 20, 2024.
